column4: Anyone around?. Who can tell me how i can get my ubuntu server to rename a complete folder with 84 .rar files in it without ruining the file inside the rar files?? :(
are the names u want to rename files to following any pattern?
well atm the name of the files are with spaces ... and it needs to be with . instead of the spaces
the only way i can think of is with find command
well the right way to do is by find command
i dunno how to use so i write shell scripts :0
save it on your desktop as spaces.sh
and then from terminal do bash spaces.sh /path/to/directory/*
make sure u type in the right path
for instance if your rars are in /home/user/rarfiles
